product_name: All Terrain KidSport Spray Sunscreen SPF 30 - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: All Terrain KidSport Spray SPF 30 sunscreen provides full-spectrum UVA and UVB protection and it comes in a convenient spray bottle for easy application. Uses transparent zinc oxide that won't turn your skin white; lotion is nongreasy and fragrance free. Water-resistant and sweat-resistant lotion is effective after 80 min. in water. Spray bottle makes it easy to apply sunscreen on kids. Natural formula does not contain oxybenzone or paraben. All Terrain KidSport Spray SPF 30 sunscreen is one of the top-rated sunscreens by the Environmental Working Group.
short_description: All Terrain KidSport Spray SPF 30 sunscreen provides full-spectrum UVA and UVB protection and it comes in a convenient spray bottle for easy application.
